query: Compare AI investments mentioned by all three companies in their 2024 10-Ks
answer:
All three companies, Google, Microsoft, and NVIDIA, have made significant investments in AI and plan to continue doing so. 

Google has been investing in building AI capabilities into new and existing products and services, such as Google Cloud, Google Workspace, Google Search, and Google Photos. They have also been investing in large language models and believe AI can solve societal, scientific, and engineering challenges. 

Microsoft is committed to making artificial intelligence available broadly and responsibly. They are infusing AI capabilities into their consumer and commercial offerings and have various engineering groups focused on AI, such as Cloud and AI, Microsoft AI, and Technology and Research. 

NVIDIA has been leveraging its GPU architecture to create platforms for AI solutions, scientific computing, data science, and more. They have launched various AI inference platforms and software offerings and continue to invest in their two operating segments: Compute & Networking and Graphics. 

All three companies recognize the transformative potential of AI and are making significant investments to incorporate it into their products and services.
reasoning: The answer is based on the provided context from the 10-K filings of Google, Microsoft, and NVIDIA, specifically focusing on mentions of AI investments and future plans related to artificial intelligence. The answer summarizes each company's AI-related investments and highlights their ongoing commitment to this technology.
